display_long_description:
Unleash chaos and hilarity with BLUD, your very own mixed reality rage room! 
Turn your home into a battleground of absurd destruction, where colorful flying unicorns invade your space and only you can stop them.

[media]

"Bro woke up and chose violence" 🦄


# Absurd Weapons
Guns, chainsaws, crayons, and more — choose your tools of destruction and get creative with how you take down those pesky unicorns.

[media]



# Multiple Game Modes
Whether you're racing against time, pulling off trick shots, stopping a zombie outbreak, or focusing on one specific target (looking at you, Larry), there's a mode for every kind of chaos-lover.

[media]

# Endless Humor
Featuring Larry, a sarcastic talking unicorn with hundreds of hilarious lines, ready to taunt and entertain you throughout the madness.

[media]

# 100% Mixed Reality
Experience unicorn carnage in your own home as the game seamlessly blends your environment with a magical, blood-splattered battlefield.

[media]

# Endless Fun
Enjoy hours of replayable chaos that's perfect for showing off the power of mixed reality to friends and family.

Transform your home into a wild, magical rage room and let the glitter, poop, and blood fly!

Are you ready to paint your walls with unicorn blood?

Transform your home into a wild, magical rage room and let the glitter, poop, and blood fly!

Are you ready to paint your walls with unicorn blood?
